LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day this book may be used to grant a random spell scroll.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，这本书可以用于获得一个随机卷轴。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Book of Infinite Spells
A +2 Leather Armour with an increase to Max Dexterity of +4 and no arcane failure bonus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这件+2皮甲的最大敏捷加值+4，没有奥术失败率惩罚。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: CatskinArmor
This +2 leather armor is made of a smooth supple leather and seems to mold to your form, making it more of a second skin.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这件+2皮甲如此顺滑，就好像你的第二层皮肤一样贴身。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Purrfect Fit
placeholder gilmore first time meeting text
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 我这里有些好东西，只要你出得起价钱。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Hello, you've come again? Not just to look at me I hope?
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你又来了？希望你不是只来看望我的。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Can I help you?
What are these exclusive goods, then?
Be seeing ya
Shaun Gilmore
The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 80 units of ice ammunition per day. Ice ammunition deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}ice damage{/g} on hit.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个箭筒的持有者每天可以用它射击80发冰弹药，冰弹药造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}寒冷伤害{/g}。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ice Arrow Quiver
Cloud to Ground
This spear is wreathed in electrical energy. On hit it may release this energy on a enemy in a 30 yard radius.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这把矛充满了电能。击中时可能会向半径30码内的敌人释放这种能量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Twenty percent chance on hit this weapon inflicts 2d8 lightning damage to an enemy within 30 yards.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 百分之二十的几率命中时对30码内的敌人造成2d8的闪电伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lightning Rod

Whenever this +1 glaive lands a hit on a new enemy for the first time, the target receives {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} negative {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, and all other enemies in a 15-foot radius must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 21) or become shaken for three {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.If the target is killed, all other enemies in a 20-foot radius must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 17) or become feared for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 用这把+1大砍刀对每个敌人第一次命中时额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点负向能量{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}，且15尺半径内的所有其他敌人必须成功进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 21），否则陷入3{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}战栗状态。如果目标被杀死，20尺半径内的所有其他敌人必须成功进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 17），否则陷入一{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}惊恐状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day you may use this item to grant you party members each a random food buff, doing so removes any current food buff.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以使用这个物品给你的队员每人一个随机的食物增益，这样做会去除任何当前的食物效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Grats a different food buff
Rumbling Satisfaction
Once per you may use this item to grant you party members each a random food buff, doing so removes any current food buff.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以使用这个物品给你的队员每人一个随机的食物增益，这样做会去除任何当前的食物效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The pot never runs out of food, but you swear you've seen a paw clawing for help, or a tail wriggling about in the boiling slop.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 大锅里的食物从来不会用完，但你发誓，你曾经见过锅里有伸出一只爪子在呼救，或是有一条在沸腾的浆液中蠕动的尾巴。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Pot of Plenty
This bastard sword deals 1d4 magic damage and 4d6 elemental damage of a random type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这把重剑造成1d4魔法伤害，4d6随机类型的元素伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 很少有人见过这样的重剑。刀刃由五彩斑斓的彩色光芒构成，各种颜色争相辉映。
Prismatic Blade
This ring grants its wearer a continuous shield spell effect.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这枚戒指给予携带者持续性的护盾术效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This ring grants its wearer a continuous shield spell effect.
This ring grants its wearer a continuous shield spell effect.
This is a dull iron ring, with a faded engraving that reads: ..ever .. ... Shield. .... .
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这枚钝铁戒指上刻着暗淡的铭刻，勉强可以看出是恒盾两个字。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ring of Evershield
placeholder
placeholdershort
Shifting Page
